name: Hopping Mad (JustAnotherNerd)
description:
Simple endless game. Jump to collect coins while avoiding the birds.

Assets Used: 

Ground, Sky Sprite, Bird Sprites: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/2d-sprites-pack-737...

Player Character: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-demo-character-sprite-she...
